document.heading: Douglass Knoll, Golden Rule, 1728 W Street, and Wagner Gainsville Real Property Tax Exemption Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-336, the “Douglass Knoll, Golden Rule, 1728 W Street, and Wagner Gainsville Real Property Tax Exemption Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-1034 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 7, 2004, and December 21, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 19, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 15-750 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-336 became effective on April 12, 2005.
